# Simple Portfolio App

> A production-grade portfolio management application built with Next.js and TypeScript.

## About

Simple Portfolio App is a free investment portfolio tracker that lets users create portfolios, add assets (stocks, crypto), and monitor real-time valuations in USD. It serves as a technical showcase demonstrating full-stack development, security hardening, and DevOps best practices.

## Features

- Portfolio Management: Create and organize multiple investment portfolios
- Asset Tracking: Track stocks, crypto, and other assets with real-time valuations
- Performance Monitoring: Monitor holdings value in USD across all portfolios
- Secure Authentication: JWT with HttpOnly cookies, OWASP Top 10 compliance
- Multilingual: English and French support
- Responsive Design: Works on desktop, tablet, and mobile

## Tech Stack

- Frontend: Next.js (App Router), TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui, TanStack Query, next-intl
- Backend: Python / FastAPI, SQLAlchemy 2.0, Pydantic v2, argon2 password hashing
- Infrastructure: PostgreSQL, Docker, Kubernetes (microk8s), GitHub Actions CI/CD
- Quality: SonarQube (SAST/DAST), Snyk dependency scanning, 85%+ test coverage
